column2: an A.M. Eatery////This place is AH-mazing!!!  Not only is the atmosphere so fun with cheery
column4: but the food is outstanding.  I attended the soft opening benefiting Heroes for Children this morning with five co-workers and we thoroughly enjoyed our experience.  We ordered and shared several entrees including the Breakfast Pot Pie (all I can say is wow!)
column6: the Chile Verde Benny and a flight of pancakes (ingenious idea bcuz with so many pancake varieties offered
column7: you can't pick just one!)...worth every bite.  We tried the chocolate chip
column8: blueberry and traditional pancakes.  Could have possibly been the best pancakes we've ever eaten...just wow.
